settings.title: Why Choose Auto Enhance Hub
settings.description: We're committed to providing the best car parts and customer experience in Brampton

settings.title: Prepare Your Vehicle
settings.description: Ensure your car is parked on level ground and the engine is cool. Gather all necessary tools and read through the installation instructions.
settings.additional_info: Always disconnect the battery before starting any electrical work on your vehicle.

settings.title: Remove Old Parts
settings.description: Carefully disconnect and remove the existing parts following safety protocols. Take photos before removal for reference.
settings.additional_info: Keep all original bolts and hardware in case you need to reinstall them later.

settings.title: Install New Parts
settings.description: Mount your new Auto Enhance Hub parts following the included step-by-step instructions. Double-check all connections.
settings.additional_info: Don't fully tighten bolts until all parts are in position to allow for minor adjustments.

settings.title: Test & Enjoy
settings.description: Test all connections and functionality before taking your vehicle on the road. Enjoy your upgraded performance!
settings.additional_info: If you experience any issues, contact our support team at 416-309-1913 for assistance.

settings.title: Easy Installation Process
settings.description: Follow these simple steps to install your new car parts safely and effectively

settings.title: Customer Reviews
settings.description: See what our customers are saying about their experience with Auto Enhance Hub

settings.question: Do you offer installation services?
settings.answer: Yes! We provide professional installation services in the Brampton area. Our certified technicians ensure your parts are installed correctly and safely. Contact us at 416-309-1913 to schedule an appointment.

settings.question: How do I know if a part is compatible with my vehicle?
settings.answer: Use our compatibility checker tool on each product page or contact our experts at 416-309-1913. We'll help you find the perfect fit for your specific make, model, and year. Simply provide us with your VIN number for the most accurate match.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on all products. Items must be in original condition with packaging. Installation fees are non-refundable. Please contact us before returning any items to ensure a smooth process.

settings.question: Do you offer warranties on your products?
settings.answer: Yes, all our products come with manufacturer warranties ranging from 1-5 years depending on the item. Extended warranty options are available for select items. Contact us at sales@autoenhancehub.com for specific warranty details.

settings.question: Do you ship across Canada?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship nationwide across Canada. Free shipping is available on orders over $75. Express shipping options are available for urgent orders. Local customers in Brampton can also choose pickup to save on shipping costs.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.description: Find answers to common questions about our products and services
settings.contact_text: Can't find what you're looking for? Our expert team is here to help with any questions about installation, compatibility, or product details.
